long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension parses your calendar and breaks down your tuition fees into daily/monthly amounts based on today's classes. By understanding what each day at school is costing you, you're more likely to make the most out of your classes. It's a simple yet effective way to stay motivated and focused on your educational investment. Whether you're budgeting or just curious, this extension provides a clear, day-by-day breakdown of your tuition, making the abstract cost of education tangible and manageable.

All data is securely stored on your local chrome browser - the extension works offline, try it!

Share your receipts with friends to show how much today cost you :)
